_generated.employee_feedback: The positive aspects of working at McKinsey mentioned in the text include supportive teams, decent work-life balance, great benefits, interesting work, and growth opportunities. Employees appreciate the firm for offering a good environment to launch a career, with some expressing gratitude for their time at the company. However, there are also mentions of the firm losing its magic and having little room for growth. Overall, McKinsey is recognized as a good place to work with some challenges and changes over the years.

_scenes.text: A bustling office filled with supportive teams collaborating on innovative AI projects.
_scenes.image_prompt: Image of a modern office with employees working together around a conference table, smiling and engaged in conversation, natural light flooding the room, dressed in smart casual attire.
_scenes.audio_prompt: Welcome to the world of AI Engineering at McKinsey, where collaboration sparks brilliance.

_scenes.text: An AI Engineer enjoying a peaceful moment in a cozy nook, symbolizing work-life balance.
_scenes.image_prompt: Image of an employee sitting in a comfortable armchair, with a laptop on their lap, a cup of coffee on the side table, and a large window with a view of the city skyline.
_scenes.audio_prompt: Discover the harmony of work and life, woven into every aspect of your career.

_scenes.text: A joyful employee receiving great benefits, with a focus on health and wellness.
_scenes.image_prompt: Image of a happy person holding a benefits package, standing in an open office space with plants and fitness equipment in the background.
_scenes.audio_prompt: Reap the rewards of a career that cares for your well-being, inside and out.

_scenes.text: An AI Engineer deep in thought, working on a complex and fascinating AI problem.
_scenes.image_prompt: Image of a focused employee in front of a large computer screen, displaying intricate AI algorithms, in a well-lit, modern office space.
_scenes.audio_prompt: Engage with work that challenges and captivates, driving innovation forward.

_scenes.text: A motivated employee climbing a metaphorical ladder, representing growth opportunities.
_scenes.image_prompt: Image of a person ascending a stylized ladder that leads up towards a bright, open sky, symbolizing career growth and potential.
_scenes.audio_prompt: Ascend to new heights, where opportunities for growth are as vast as your ambition.

_scenes.text: A group of smiling AI Engineers celebrating a successful project, showcasing team spirit.
_scenes.image_prompt: Image of a team of joyful employees high-fiving and celebrating in front of a large digital display showing successful project results.
_scenes.audio_prompt: Join us at McKinsey, where your next career leap is just a project away.
